quiz.question: What is the primary function of FCM in push notifications?
options: To send messages to Android devices
quiz.hint: FCM is primarily used for Android devices.

quiz.question: Which of the following is necessary for APNS integration in an iOS app?
quiz.hint: APNS requires a specific Apple security credential.

quiz.question: What role do local notifications play in mobile applications?
options: They allow apps to send updates when the app is closed
They provide notifications without a server
They manage deep linking in apps
quiz.hint: Local notifications do not require server interaction.

quiz.question: How does background fetch benefit an application?
options: It allows apps to execute code when the app is in the foreground
It updates app content even when the app is not actively used
It sends push notifications to the user
quiz.hint: Background fetch keeps the app data updated without user intervention.

quiz.question: Which technique is used to open a specific view or page within an app from an external link?
quiz.hint: Think about linking directly to a specific content in the app.
